J

JarDistillerJFrame - class jpo.JarDistillerJFrame.
Deprecated. This is not peoperly thought through and should not be used.
JarDistillerJFrame(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.JarDistillerJFrame
Deprecated. Creates a Window and asks for the name of the jar file to generate.
JarDistillerThread - class jpo.JarDistillerThread.
a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file
JarDistillerThread(File, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.JarDistillerThread
Write all the nodes indicated by the startNode to the jar file indicated in the parameter outputFile.
JarFilter - class jpo.JarFilter.
This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .jar.
JarFilter() - Constructor for class jpo.JarFilter
 
JpgFilter - class jpo.JpgFilter.
This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .jpg or .jpeg.
JpgFilter() - Constructor for class jpo.JpgFilter
 
Jpo - class jpo.Jpo.
Jpo is the the main class of a browser application that lets a user view a collection of pictures in as thumbnails, in a seperate window or in a full sized mode.
Jpo() - Constructor for class jpo.Jpo
Constructor for the Jpo application that creates the main JFrame, attaches an ApplicationJMenuBar, adds a JSplitPane to which it adds the CleverJTree on the left side and a ThumbnailJScrollPane on the right side.
JpoResources - class jpo.JpoResources.
class that holds the generic labels for the JPO application.
JpoResources() - Constructor for class jpo.JpoResources
 
JpoResources_fr - class jpo.JpoResources_fr.
class that holds the translated french labels for the JPO application
JpoResources_fr() - Constructor for class jpo.JpoResources_fr
 
JpoTransferable - class jpo.JpoTransferable.
 
JpoTransferable(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.JpoTransferable
Constructor
jFrame - Variable in class jpo.GroupInfoEditor
JFrame that holds all the dialog components for editing the window.
jTable1 - Variable in class jpo.ExcelAdapter
 
jTree - Variable in class jpo.XmlReaderThread
temporary storage for the tree to expand afterwards
jarAutostartList - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
Object that gets populated by the main Jpo object if it can discover a file called autostartJarPicturelist in the Classpath.
jarOut - Variable in class jpo.JarDistillerThread
the Jar stream we shall write all the output to
jarRoot - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
the path to the jar file; derived from jarAutostartList
jpgQuality - Variable in class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread
The compression rate passed to the jpg compressor 0 - 1. 0 means maximum compression and crap quality, 1 means best quality minimal compression. 0.8 is a good value.
jpgQuality - Variable in class jpo.ScalablePicture
the quality with which the JPG pictures shall be written. 0 means poor 1 means great.
jpgQualityJSlider - Variable in class jpo.HtmlDistillerJFrame
Slider that allows the quality of the jpg's to be specified.
jpgQualityJSlider - Variable in class jpo.SettingsDialog
slider that allows the quality of the jpg's to be specified
jpo - package jpo
 
jpoResources - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
the resourceBundle is a Java thing that sorts out language customisation
jvmHasReader(File) - Static method in class jpo.Tools
This method checks whether the JVM has an image reader for the supplied File.
